definition: Lu You (1125-1210), widely regarded as the greatest of the Southern Song poets

sentences.english: Lu You was a famous patriotic poet in the Southern Song Dyansty .
sentences.chinese: 陆游诗南宋著名的爱国诗人。

sentences.english: An image of "feed cattles" appeared frequently in Lu Yous later poems.
sentences.chinese: 陆游后期诗歌作品中屡屡出现“饭牛”意象。

sentences.english: Face up to that fact, will help to deepen our understanding of Lu You's poetries.
sentences.chinese: 正视这一事实，有助于加深对陆游诗歌的认识。

sentences.english: Lu you was one of long life poet in ancient time of our country, died 86 years old.
sentences.chinese: 陆游是我国古代诗人中最长寿者之一，卒年86岁。

sentences.english: I do not like Lu You, because I think emotionally, he is too weak.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢陆游，因为我觉得在感情方面，他太懦弱。

sentences.english: As Dai Fugu once was taught by Lu You, his view on life was inevitably influenced from it.
sentences.chinese: 戴复古曾师从陆游，人生理念自然受其影响。

sentences.english: Lu You is the famous patriotic poet and thinker of the Southern Song Dynasty of China.
sentences.chinese: 陆游是我国南宋时期著名的爱国主义诗人和思想家。

sentences.english: Then I called to mind a poem written by Lu you.
sentences.chinese: 这时我想起陆游写出的一首诗。

definition: Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
Li Qingzhao (1084-c. 1151), southern Song female poet
Ouyang Xiu (1007-1072), Northern Song dynasty prose writer and historian
Du Fu (712-770), great Tang dynasty poet
Meng Jiao (751-814), Tang dynasty essayist and poet
Wang Yucheng (954-1001) Song dynasty literary figure
Su Dongpo, another name for Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼 (1037-1101), northern Song writer and calligrapher
Huang Tingjian (1045-1105), Song poet and calligrapher
Su Zhe (1039-1112), Northern Song writer and calligrapher, one of the 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and also one of the 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 ba1 da4 jia1]
